channel.title: Global objects problem
channel.description: Hey, I am currently trying to change some global items in a tower. But i have added some global items to the 3rd level , but if i log in on the 2nd floor, they are there instead of on the 3rd floor, oviously cause they have the same coords. Is there anyway I could change it so that when I log in the items ive placed on the 3rd floor stay there, and ones i place on the 2nd will stay there?

item.title: Global objects problem
item.dc:creator: @Mellor Mellor
item.description:
@Mellor wrote:

Thats what i thought ^~ , let mi see.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2009, 03:19:40 pm[/size][hr]Nope, they just dissapear =p , not sure where they went haha

Read full topic

But i have added some global items to the 3rd level , but if i log in on the 2nd floor, they are there instead of on the 3rd floor, oviously cause they have the same coords.
